snippet: A federal jury awarded Noel J. Guzman the money after he testified that in 2009 officers kicked, stomped and arrested him after they responded to a fight in which he had not been involved in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury awarded Noel J. Guzman the money after he testified that in 2009 officers kicked, stomped and arrested him after they responded to a fight in which he had not been involved in Manhattan.

headline.main: Man Is Granted $2.4 Million for False Arrest and Beating by Police
headline.print_headline: $2.4 Million for Man Over False Arrest and Beating by Police
